cause.description:
Bring back prohibition to America and keep a much better eye on it. Alcohol leads to bad things and this world would be much better off without it.
1. One American killed by a drunk driver every 31 minutes.
2. Alcohol affects the brain, causing slurred speech, clumsiness, slow reflexes, and a loss of inhibition.
3. 75,754 Americans die a year from excess consumption of alcohol.
cause.name: Abolish Alcohol
